languages.text: {n}Винтерскейл яростно рычит, сверля вас взглядом, но вскоре сдается и недовольно выплевывает:{/n} "Ладно, {name}. У тебя больше прав на эту добычу, так что поохоться на славу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Винтерскейл яростно рычит, сверля вас взглядом, но вскоре сдается и недовольно выплевывает:{/n} "Ладно, {name}. У тебя больше прав на эту добычу, так что поохоться на славу".
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."
languages.original_text: {n}Винтерскейл яростно рычит, сверля вас взглядом, но вскоре сдается и недовольно выплевывает:{/n} "Ладно, {name}. У тебя больше прав на эту добычу, так что поохоться на славу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously and glares at you, but soon gives up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. So have a good hunt."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously and glares at you, but soon gives up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. So have a good hunt."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Winterscale emite un gruñido de furia y te fulmina con la mirada, pero al poco relaja su expresión y se limita a responder con resentimiento:{/n} «De acuerdo, {name}. Tuyo será el privilegio de cobrarte ese trofeo. Buena caza».
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale emite un gruñido de furia y te fulmina con la mirada, pero al poco relaja su expresión y se limita a responder con resentimiento:{/n} «De acuerdo, {name}. Tuyo será el privilegio de cobrarte ese trofeo. Buena caza».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔愤怒地咆哮，直勾勾瞪着你，但他很快控制住了怒火，忿忿地吐出一口气。{/n}“好吧，{name}，你比我更有资格夺得那件战利品。祝你狩猎好运。”
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔愤怒地咆哮，直勾勾瞪着你，但他很快控制住了怒火，忿忿地吐出一口气。{/n}“好吧，{name}，你比我更有资格夺得那件战利品。祝你狩猎好运。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Winterscale pousse un grognement furieux en vous lançant un regard assassin, mais il se reprend rapidement et vous lance d'un air irrité :{/n} « Très bien, {name}. Votre droit à ce trophée est supérieur au mien. Bonne chasse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale pousse un grognement furieux en vous lançant un regard assassin, mais il se reprend rapidement et vous lance d'un air irrité :{/n} « Très bien, {name}. Votre droit à ce trophée est supérieur au mien. Bonne chasse. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールは激しく唸り、あなたを睨みつけたが、すぐに気を落ち着かせ、恨めしそうにこう吐き捨てた。{/n}「いいだろう、{name}。その戦利品を手にする権利があるのはお前の方だ。いい狩りだった」
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウィンタースケールは激しく唸り、あなたを睨みつけたが、すぐに気を落ち着かせ、恨めしそうにこう吐き捨てた。{/n}「いいだろう、{name}。その戦利品を手にする権利があるのはお前の方だ。いい狩りだった」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Winterzunder knurrt zornig und starrt dich böse an, gibt jedoch bald auf und spuckt voller Verachtung aus:{/n} "Also gut, {name}. Euch steht die Trophäe eher zu. Weidmanns Heil."
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunder knurrt zornig und starrt dich böse an, gibt jedoch bald auf und spuckt voller Verachtung aus:{/n} "Also gut, {name}. Euch steht die Trophäe eher zu. Weidmanns Heil."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Winterscale, sana bakarak öfkeyle uluyor ama sonrasında vazgeçip gücenmiş bir tonla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İyi {name}. O ganimet senin hakkın. İyi avlar dilerim."
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale growls furiously, glaring at you, but soon lets up and spits out resentfully,{/n} "Fine, {name}. You have the greater claim to that trophy. Good hunting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale, sana bakarak öfkeyle uluyor ama sonra vazgeçip gücenmiş bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İyi {name}. O ganimet senin hakkın. İyi avlar dilerim."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
